item.title: ClientBundle - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: Chapter 4. Menu This Chapter covers design of Menu system used by Fins. Menu contains three widgets MenuItem MenuHeader MenuBar Figure 4.1. Menu parts MenuHeader is a stylish header that display menu categories. MenuItem is GWT Anchor widget and the user clicks them to invoke menu options. MenuBar is a StackLayoutPanel with MenuHeader as header and MenuItem as content. console.log("slot C"
